#define ll long long int
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define getchar_unlocked() getchar()
#endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
inline int input(){int n=0;register int ch=getchar_unlocked();while(ch<48)ch=getchar_unlocked();while(ch>47)n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ch-'0',ch=getchar_unlocked();return n;}
inline ll inputl(){ll n=0;register int ch=getchar_unlocked();int sign=1; if(ch=='-') sign=-1;while(ch<48)ch=getchar_unlocked(); while(ch>47)n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ch-'0',ch=getchar_unlocked();return (ll)(n*sign);}
vector<ll> v,v1,v2;
int main(){
        ll n=inputl(),pr=0,el,c=0,c1=0,c2=0,max=LONG_MAX;
        for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
              el=inputl();
              if(el==0) c++;
              if(el>0)  v1.push_back(i);
              if(el<0)  v2.push_back(i);
              v.push_back(el);
        }
        //cout<<c<<endl;
        c1=0;
        for(ll i=0;i<n-1;i++){
               if(v[i]>0) c1++;
               c2=v2.end()-lower_bound(v2.begin(),v2.end(),i+1) ;
               //cout<<c2<<endl;
               if(max>c1+c2)  max=c1+c2;              
               
        }
        //cout<<max<<endl;
        cout<<c+max<<endl;  
    return 0;
}
